participant_id.Description: Participant identifiers with the first letter encoding the centre and study

Levels.b: Biomarkers-I study at Woolcock Institute (controls only)
Levels.f: Insomnia phenotyping study at Flinders Institute
Levels.v: Vulnerability for Alertness Failure at Woolcock Institute (controls only)
Levels.w: Insomnia phenotyping study at Woolcock Institute

handedness.Description: Handedness of the participant as reported by the participant
